course_title: Advanced PT Applications of Pain Neuroscience
course_description: This course is designed as an advanced study of pain science informed diagnosis and treatment in physical therapy practice. Materials will be presented with a focus on case-based learning and an emphasis on practical application of treatment and diagnosis principles utilizing hands-on lab sessions and advanced case study examples. Students enrolling in this course will be expected to have a strong interest in pain science, and the evaluation and treatment of upper extremity and lower extremity neurodynamics.
